iicActor.sequence commands¶

Submodules¶

This page list of all IIC sequencing related commands.

Each command should be contain a description and their input arguments listed.

class iicActor.Commands.SequenceCmd.SequenceCmd(actor)¶

Bases: object

abortExposure(cmd)¶

iic sps @abort [id=N]

abort current sps exposure.

Parameters

id (int) – optional sequenceId.

annotate(cmd)¶

iic annotate bad|ok [notes=???] [visit=N] [visitSet=N] [cam=???] [arm=???] [sm=???]

annotate given visit or visitSet.

Parameters

  • notes (str) – list of command to be describe the sequence.

  • visit (int) – visitId to annotate.

  • visitSet (int) – visitSetId to annotate

  • cam (list of str) – specify which camera is/are involved

  • arm (list of str) – specify which arm is/are involved

  • sm (list of int) – specify which spectrograph module is/are involved

finishExposure(cmd)¶

iic sps @finishExposure [id=N]

finish current sps exposure.

Parameters

id (int) – optional sequenceId.

property resourceManager¶
sequenceStatus(cmd)¶

iic sequenceStatus [id=N]

get IIC sequence status

Parameters

id (int) – optional sequenceId.
